author: The Washington Post
title: Ground News - AI craze driving Nasdaq 100's best run since 1999
text:
Summary by The Washington Post A banner year for stocks is drawing to a close, with gains in big tech leaving the market near all-time highs amid the artificial-intelligence exuberance and dovish Federal Reserve bets. Share menu More
